data.name: Premortal VR
data.description:
Premortal VR is an exploration and survival game for singleplayer set in a procedurally-generated world. Survive and explore the vast unique world. Gather valuable resources. Craft mighty weapons and armor. Sculpt the landscape as you see fit. Build villages and castles. Prepare well for your trials and ascend beyond!

Every new world is uniquely generated for the player. The terrain system makes sure there is complete variety in the generated foliage, structures, animals, and items. The ground itself can be terraformed using a shovel.

The world is filled with usable resources like stone, wood, potatoes, copper and so much more! The player has a few stats like health and stamina which can be increased by the various food in the game. Some of the food can be cooked for bonus stats.

The game features a crafting system that resembles real-world crafting techniques. Armor can be made using the sewing system. And metal weapons can be forged on the anvil using a smithing mechanic.

Players can build structures by accessing their handbook and selecting their desired unlocked build. Each build requires building materials that can be gathered from the world. Some builds have additional effects. For example, the bed allows the player to sleep and skip the night.

There are powerful bosses that can be challenged. After every boss is defeated, the premortal has passed their trials and can ascend.

changelog.change_log:
v1.1.0: Official Release Steam and AppLab

* New Features
- Added item spawn menu in creative mode
- Added quick slot on secondary button press (3 tools)
- Added shelf and removed chest
- Building material requirements have been reduced. Breaking a build now returns all materials
- Added auto item place in build. If you're building a wooden floor and have small planks in your backpack, they will automatically go inside the build on place
- Reduced boar follow distance
- Added sleep text next to bed sleep icon
- Dagger sliding in crafts now consumed durability
- Bow pulling now consumes stamina
- Improved animal forward occlusion which will allow them to move better
- Day and night cycle increased from 30 to 60 IRL minutes. Day is 40 and night is 20 minutes.
- Cooked potato is now not plantable
- Pouch containing dirt can now be used as dirt to terraform
- Added light to campfire
- Backpack item loading is now instant
- Improved night and day lighting
- Added ascension ground stone line to ascension island
- Block range was changed slightly
- Added wiki smelting
- Tanning rack is now easier to use
- Added display rack build
- Added tool rack build
- Added procedurally in the world - small shrine that lights the way
- Added auto trigger checkbox to sawbuck
- Improved sawbuck trigger detection
- Improved bronze hammer hit detection
- Added light to smelter

* Bug Fixes
- Fixed Tuskan plays boar death SFX
- Fixed backpack store item SFX incorrect position
- Fixed cloud ambiance audio
- Fixed slider SFX
- Fixed SFX playing on load
- Fixed achievement SFX
- Added dragon footstep SFX
- Added portal passive SFX
- Added crafting SFX
- Hair and beard now load correctly
- Fixed sand has square lines
- Fixed pickaxe craft allows to grab pickaxe head before completion
- Same type food but different state now don't stack in the same pouch (ex. raw meat doesn't combine in a pouch with cooked meat)
- Fixed bug where boar death SFX would play on reload
- Fixed bug where dead player could pick up items (spooky)
- Fixed bug where sew could be canceled after completion to return the materials and keep the product (duplication)
- Fixed floating items near spawn and other locations
- Autosaving in Homestead disabled
- Test and demo saves now don't show in selection
- Fixed teal screen on start (shaders loading)
- Fixed pouch and shelf items disappear when out of range load
- Fixed player in air after dirt place near
